By torey luvullo on Friday, December 17, 2004 - 05:03 am:

I wish I could make an informed prediction for the fight. I have fought, and lost to, all of the three monsters, who will duel tonight for the ultimate prize. My uninformed prediction:

[1] Pokylips
[2] Vectrex
[3] Flo

I just think that Pokylips' strong techs give him a slight edge. Vectrex's guts regen gives him a real shot. And Flo is no slouch - in fact, when I mentioned these predictions to Dead Buffalo last night [DB, of xourse, the trainer of the mighty Pokylips] he thought that Flo would probably beat his guy.

So, let the games begin.
